author: @infobae
title: Attal acusa a Bardella de "estigmatizar" a los binacionales y de investir a candidatos con pasado racista - Infobae
text: El primer ministro y candidato presidencial, Gabriel Attal, ha acusado este jueves a la propuesta de la ultraderecha de Agrupación Nacional, Jordan Bardella, haber "estigmatizado" a tres millones de franceses con doble nacionalidad, después de asegurar que serían excluidos de algunos cargos públicos en caso de ganar y de haber investido "a más de cien candidatos" con historiales racistas y homófobos. La ultraderecha está diciendo a estas personas que "son la mitad de franceses" que el resto de sus compatriotas. Quiere "estigmatizar a tres millones y medio de franceses binacionales", ha reprochado Attal durante el último debate antes de las elecciones legislativas anticipadas de este domingo. "¡Estáis creando franceses de segunda clase!", le ha dicho, por su parte, Olivier Faure, secretario general del Partido Socialista, quien ha acudido al debate televisado en representación de la candidatura del Nuevo Frente Popular. Asimismo, Attal ha continuado acusando de nuevo a Bardella de haber investido a "más de un centenar de candidatos" con algún historiales racistas, antisemitas y homófobos. "Es decir casi uno de cada cinco", ha dicho, entre las protestas del líder de la ultraderecha que le ha llamado "mentiroso". Bardella ha reprochado a sus adversarios de pretender "jugar con los miedos" de los electores a pocos días de las elecciones. "¿Cuándo he dicho yo que las personas con doble nacionalidad no son verdaderos franceses?", se ha preguntado. Así, si bien ha señalado que no cuestiona la doble nacionalidad, al mismo tiempo ha defendido que tal circunstancia "podría plantear un problema y requeriría un refuerzo de los controles", en lo que respecta, ha dicho, ha cuestiones de seguridad. Los franceses acuden este domingo a votar a las primera vuelta de unas elecciones parlamentarias convocadas de manera anticipada por el presidente Emmanuel Macron después de los malos resultados de su partido en las europeas, en las que se impuso la ultraderecha que representa Agrupación Nacional. Según las encuestas, esta sería la principal elección entre los franceses, con más del 35 por ciento de los votos, seguido de la coalición de izquierdas Nuevo Frente Popular, que lograría el 29 por ciento de los apoyos. En tercer lugar, quedaría Renacimiento, el partido de Macron, rozando el 20 por ciento.

author: 小浪财讯
title: 央企ETF（510060）跌0.71%，半日成交额291.44万元|ETF_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，央企ETF（510060）跌0.71%，报2.522元，成交额291.44万元。央企ETF（510060）重仓股方面， 招商银行 截止午盘跌0.70%， 长江电力 跌0.33%， 交通银行 涨0.13%， 中信证券 跌1.55%， 中芯国际 跌0.23%， 农业银行 涨0.17%， 京沪高铁 跌0.17%， 光大银行 跌0.49%， 中国银行 涨0.36%， 中国神华 跌0.66%。
央企ETF（510060）业绩比较基准为 上证中央企业50指数 （简称上证央企指数），管理人为工银瑞信基金管理有限公司，基金经理为赵栩，成立（2009-08-26）以来回报为62.69%，近一个月回报为1.29%。

author: AB Newswire
title: Midwest Tropical Unveil Charismatic Characteristics Of Indoor Water Wall Feature | dailytimesleader.com | Serving West Point & Clay County Since 1867
text:
Setting up an indoor water wall feature means setting up a space that is not only particularly evocative from an aesthetic point of view but also increases living or business comfort.
The interior water walls at Midwest Tropical are perfect in residential or commercial contexts, allowing you to enhance settings and, at the same time, take on an attractive symbolic value to achieve peace and serenity.
Indoor water wall feature: versatile characteristics
As we know, water refers to the deeper meaning of life, to purity and complete well-being. The presence of an interior water wall is fundamental in any property. For this reason, it will be possible to install a water wall feature with an exclusive design to obtain a whole series of benefits.
At Midwest Tropical, our indoor water wall feature is nothing more than an architectural element in line with the latest design trends. It also performs various practical functions, as it can be effectively used to separate rooms without obstructing the passage of light. Our interior water wall designs are fascinating for decorating spaces that would otherwise be bare or anonymous.
The assortment of water wall features to be placed exclusively indoors is wider than you might imagine. It includes models made with different materials, which fit well with any style and finish in the room. Safe and suitable even for little ones, indoor water wall features can create microbubbles that enchant you. The water bubbles, in addition to a "wow" effect on your guests, make the environment more livable and balanced.
Water gives harmony and well-being to the body and mind. It is no coincidence that the Orientals (very attentive to body and mind balance) were the precursors of the use of these objects in domestic and business environments. Usually, the indoor water wall feature, equipped with a pump, appears as more or less compact panels in which the water flows inside tubular sections and with the most singular shapes, as well as from holes and stones. However, there is no shortage of original creations, such as the spheres or the windows, which are also customizable and have a hypnotic effect.
In any case, the flow of water generated by the refined water wall feature produces a particularly pleasant rustle that promotes calm, concentration and relaxation. The installation of an indoor water wall feature occurs quite quickly. It does not require masonry work or other invasive interventions, as it is sufficient to immerse the pump and connect it to the electricity.
Today, there is no shortage of solutions for tasteful furnishing. Still, interior water walls can make the difference, given that they exploit a precious and natural element such as water to add that sophisticated touch to every room that never hurts.
Even when it comes to maintenance, it is very minimal. There is also an interior water wall equipped with LEDs, i.e., variable color on command, to be adjusted according to specific preferences, thanks to which fascinating light effects and unique, exciting atmospheres can be created.

author: @kotatweets
title: 'Very optimistic,' crews make progress on more than 37,000-acre Cheyenne River Reservation fire
text:
‘Very optimistic,’ crews make progress on more than 37,000-acre Cheyenne River Reservation fire
RAPID CITY, S.D. (KOTA) - Officials are crediting cooler temperatures and calmer winds yesterday with getting a grip on the Route-13 fire.
As of Wednesday night, the fire was 50% contained.
“Going forward the operation continues to put the interior fires out,” Cheyenne River Sioux Tribe Chairman Ryman LeBeau said. “They call it mop-up, and there’s some hot spots there that, some draws that have more fuel in it more trees.”
LeBeau says on Monday, the fire came close to the Takini school and housing.
“That fire came very close, 50 feet from those houses and so we’re really thankful that all the firefighters were able to curb the fire from the Takini area,” LeBeau added.
District 5 Council Representative Joseph Brings Plenty says aside from the many firefighters, community members were also involved in the fight.
“When the main fire was raging by Takini, and that wind was pushing along there, a lot of the fire crews were up there, but some of them were digging fire lines on the north side,” Brings Plenty explained. “Because that fire was still pushing, I think there was one of the community members told me, he was trying to get to a gate, he was driving 45 miles per hour, and he said that the fire actually beat him to the gate.”
District 4 Representative Thad Rose says efforts to keep the fire today are key as winds are expected tomorrow.
“I’m pretty optimistic that it’s going to stay at its level of containment,” Rose said.
Governor Rhoden sent two national guard Black Hawks to help with the fire.
OTA AU Films provided footage for the story that aired on KOTA Territory News.

author: tengrinews.kz
title: Россия ограничила звонки в WhatsApp: что ответил мессенджер
text:
В WhatsApp ответили на сообщения Роскомнадзора об ограничении звонков в мессенджере, передает корреспондент Tengrinews.kz.
Что произошло
Напомним, что в России пользователи столкнулись с перебоями при голосовых звонках в мессенджерах WhatsApp и Telegram. Согласно статистике сервиса Downdetector, на неполадки в работе Telegram пожаловались более 7500 пользователей, а WhatsApp - свыше 3300.
Тогда Роскомнадзор подтвердил, что в РФ начали ограничивать звонки в мессенджерах из-за того, что эти сервисы всё чаще используются для мошенничества, вымогательства, а также вовлечения людей в диверсионную и террористическую деятельность. В ведомстве при этом уточнили, что владельцам мессенджеров неоднократно отправлялись требования по принятию мер по противодействию преступникам, однако они игнорировались.
Комментарий WhatsApp о блокировке звонков
Вместе с тем в WhatsApp заявили, что Россия пытается блокировать мессенджер из-за того, что он защищён сквозным шифрованием и даёт право на безопасное общение.
"WhatsApp конфиденциален, по умолчанию защищен сквозным шифрованием и противостоит попыткам правительств нарушить право людей на безопасное общение – именно поэтому российские власти пытаются блокировать WhatsApp для болee 100 миллионов наших пользователей в стране. Мы продолжим делать всё возможное, чтобы общение, защищённое сквозным шифрованием, оставалось доступным для людей по всему миру, включая Россию", - написали представители WhatsApp на своей странице в
[соцсети X].
Our statement on the news about the Russian government's attempt to block WhatsApp:
— WhatsApp (@WhatsApp)
WhatsApp is private, end-to-end encrypted, and defies government attempts to violate people’s right to secure communication, which is why Russia is trying to block it from over 100 million…[August 13, 2025]
Неофициальные данные и версии
Как писали СМИ, по неподтвержденным сведениям, крупные российские операторы связи — МТС, Билайн, Мегафон и Т2 — могли запросить ограничение звонков в иностранных мессенджерах. Причиной называют необходимость дополнительных доходов для поддержки инфраструктуры и недопущения снижения скорости интернета.
По данным Telegram-канала "Кровавая барыня", решение о запрете звонков по WhatsApp и Telegram уже принято на высшем уровне. Как сообщил источник издания на рынке телекоммуникаций, это сделано "под эгидой борьбы с террористами". Финальные консультации должны завершиться в ближайшие дни, утверждает источник в правительстве.
При этом каналы и текстовые переписки в мессенджерах останутся доступны, отмечают инсайдеры. Один из собеседников на телеком-рынке пояснил, что пока нет гарантий, что использование зарубежных SIM-карт поможет обойти запрет. По его словам, системы ТСПУ (технические средства противодействия угрозам) способны влиять и на этот трафик.
Отметим, что слухи о возможной блокировке мессенджеров в России появляются не в первый раз. Так, в июле первый замглавы комитета Госдумы по информполитике Антон Горелкин заявил, что WhatsApp пора готовиться к уходу с российского рынка, так как он, вероятно, попадет в список ПО из недружественных стран, подлежащих блокировке. При этом, по его мнению, у Telegram больше шансов остаться в России.
По мнению Горелкина, претендентом на долю WhatsApp станет национальный мессенджер MAX.

author: Mariam Abdullahi
title: Hamas agrees to truce proposal for Gaza
text:
The acceptance of the Gaza truce proposal by Hamas leader Ismail Haniyeh has been conveyed to mediators, Qatar, and Egypt, following nearly seven months of conflict by his Palestinian militant group.
In a statement released on its official website, the group announced that Haniyeh had discussed the approval of their ceasefire agreement proposal with Qatar’s Prime Minister Sheikh Mohammed bin Abdulrahman Al Thani and Egyptian Intelligence Minister Abbas Kamel over the phone.
A senior Hamas official clarified that despite the announcement, the ceasefire is not yet in effect as the Israeli side has not communicated its stance.
An additional senior official, speaking anonymously to AFP due to lack of authorization to speak publicly on negotiations, mentioned that the decision now rests with the Israeli occupation on whether to support the ceasefire agreement or impede its progress.
The news of Hamas’s acceptance comes after Israel’s call on Palestinians to evacuate eastern Rafah, signaling a potential ground invasion of the southern Gaza city, causing global concern over the repercussions.
In Rafah, where residents had expressed anxiety over the evacuation order, crowds erupted in celebrations and gunfire upon hearing Hamas’s announcement.
There were scenes of jubilation with people crying tears of joy, chanting “Allahu Akbar” (God is Greatest), and firing weapons into the air in response to the news.
Despite extensive diplomatic efforts, mediators have struggled to negotiate a new truce similar to the previous week-long ceasefire which resulted in the release of 105 hostages last November, including Israelis in exchange for Palestinians held by Israel.
Previous negotiation attempts faced obstacles, partly due to Hamas’s insistence on a lasting ceasefire and Netanyahu’s determination to eliminate remaining fighters in Rafah.
The deadliest conflict in Gaza’s history commenced after Hamas’s attack on Israel on October 7, claiming the lives of over 1,170 individuals, predominantly civilians, according to Israeli official figures cited by AFP.
Israel estimates that 128 hostages abducted during the October 7 attack remain in Gaza, with the military reporting 35 fatalities among them.
Amid vows to eradicate Hamas, Israel has conducted retaliatory actions that have resulted in the deaths of at least 34,735 people in Gaza, primarily women and children, according to the health ministry of the Hamas-controlled territory.
